casebody.data:
HERRING
v.
FOOD LION. No. 28A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 15, 2006. Gregory E. Floyd, for James C. Herring.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 14th day of March 2006 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (Food Lion, LLC) shall have up to and including the 22nd day of March 2006 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 15th day of March 2006."
